title: Production, Per Cent Expanding for United States
notes:
Data Represent The Percentage Of Companies Expanding Production. Source: National Association Of Purchasing Agents, Business Survey Reports.

This NBER data series m01308 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01308
